Wacana Pemangkasan Eselon, Pemprov Banten Akan Ada 800 Jabatan Fungsional
07 Nov 2019, 13:54 by Bahtiar Rifa'i
Serang - Wacana pemangkasan eselon IV dan III akan menghapuskan jabatan kepala bidang, kepala UPT, kepala sub bagian sampai kepala seksi. Diperkirakan ada 800 jabatan yang nanti berubah menjadi fungsional.
Sekda Banten Al Muktabar mengatakan, wacana pemangkasan eselon sebetulnya akan memangkas jalur birokrasi. Tapi, Pemprov sendiri masih menunggu keputusan pemerintah pusat terkait wacana tersebut.
"Kita bersiap untuk itu kalau memang aturannya sudah, pada dasarnya pengelolaan pemerintah sesuai peratuan perundangan, kita akan patuh," kata Muktabar kepada wartawan di Kawasan Pusat Pemerintahan Provinsi Banten (KP3B), Serang, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Sementara itu, Kepala Badan Kepegawaian Daerah (BKD) Komarudin, penghapusan eselon III dan IV di Banten akan berdampak pada pola kerja dan munculnya jabatan fungsional baru.
"Totalnya kurang lebih 800-an. eselon 3 kepala bagian sekretaris, kepala bidang, kepala UPT, kepala cabang dinas, kalau 4 kepala sub bidang, kepala sub bagian, kepala seksi," ungkap Komarudin dihubungi secara terpisah.
Jika dihapus, Pemprov akan melakukan seleksi ulang untuk penempatan mereka sebagai calon fungsional. Selain iu, sistem pemberian gaji juga akan berubah.
"Artinya dari sisi manejemen kepegawaian lebih bagus karena jabatan fungsional jelas indikator kerja dan jabatannya lebih jelas," kata Komarudin dihubungi secara terpisah.

Echelon Trimming Discourse, Banten Provincial Government There Will Be 800 Functional Positions
Nov 7 2019, 13:54 by Bahtiar Rifa'i
Serang - Discourse on echelon IV and III will abolish the position of head of the field, head of the UPT, head of subdivisions to section heads. It is estimated that there are 800 positions that will later turn into functional.
Secretary of Banten Al Muktabar said that the discourse of echelon pruning would actually cut the bureaucratic path. But, the Provincial Government itself is still waiting for the decision of the central government related to the discourse.
"We are prepared for that if the rules are already in place, basically the management of the government is in accordance with the laws and regulations, we will obey," Muktabar told reporters in Banten Province Central Government Area (KP3B), Serang, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Meanwhile, Head of the Regional Civil Service Agency (BKD) Komarudin, the elimination of echelon III and IV in Banten will have an impact on work patterns and the emergence of new functional positions.
"The total is approximately 800. Echelon 3 heads of secretaries, heads of fields, heads of UPT, heads of branch offices, if 4 heads of subdivisions, heads of subdivisions, heads of sections," said Komarudin contacted separately.
If deleted, the provincial government will re-select their placement as functional candidates. Besides this, the salary distribution system will also change.
"It means that in terms of staffing management is better because the functional position is clearly an indicator of work and the position is clearer," Komarudin said separately when contacted.
